American Federation of Radio Artists
(BRANCH OF ASSOCIATED ACTORS AND ARTISTES OF AMERICA)
AFFILIATED WITH THE AMERICAN FEDERATION OF LABOR
15 WEST 44th STREET â€¢ NEW YORK 18, N. Y.
TELEPHONE VANDERBILT 6-1810
April 30, 1951
A. Frank Reel
National
Executive Secretary
Richard L. Rider, Manager
National Assoc* of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Riders
In reply to your letter of April 27th, -we would appreciate
clearance credit on the transcriptions you describe.
I have no suggestions with reference to your enclosed form.
I do wish to point out, however, that if we find that any
other use is made of these tapes, we shall have to hold your
organization responsible for payment of the required fees*
Sincerely,
AMERICAN FEDERATION OF RADIO ARTISTS
A. FRANK REEL
NATIONAL EXECUTIVE SECRETARY
AIR:h
17
